title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Strategies for Improving Science Curriculum Design Using Curriculum Analysis Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and interpret learner data using core features of curriculum analysis tools.
Learners can establish strategies to improve science subject assessment methods and lesson sequencing based on analysis results.
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers to derive curriculum improvement plans and develop actionable implementation strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
